title: Nielseniq To Hire 5.5k People In India As It Adds Tech Hubs - Mint
content: Nielseniq To Hire 5.5k People In India As It Adds Tech Hubs  Mint
description: It has set up 3 capability centres and technology hubs in Vadodara, Chennai and Pune.The Chicago-headquartered firm has operations in 100 markets globally. It provides consumer insights and retail measurement services to its clients
